title: Free Shipping Policy
description: Orders over $50 qualify for free standard shipping within the United States. This applies to all products except oversized items which may have additional shipping charges. Free shipping typically takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping options are available for an additional fee.
exceptions: Oversized items may have additional charges

title: First Time Customer Discount
description: New customers receive a 10% discount on their first order with a maximum discount of $50. This discount is automatically applied at checkout for customers who have never placed an order before. Cannot be combined with other promotional offers.

title: Low Stock Management
description: When product inventory falls below 10 units, the system automatically sends alerts to the inventory team and updates the product status to show limited availability. Customers will see 'Only X left in stock' messaging on the product page.
applies_to: All products with stock below 10 units

title: Return Window Policy
description: Products can be returned within 30 days of purchase for a full refund, provided they are in new, unused condition with original packaging and tags. Return shipping is free for defective items. For non-defective returns, customers are responsible for return shipping costs.

title: High Value Order Security
description: Orders over $1000 require additional verification for security purposes. This may include phone verification, identity confirmation, or fraud prevention checks. Processing may take 1-2 additional business days for verification.
exceptions: VIP customers may have expedited verification

title: VIP Customer Benefits
description: VIP customers receive complimentary express shipping on all orders, priority customer support with dedicated phone line, early access to sales, and exclusive member-only promotions. VIP status is earned after $2000 in annual purchases.
exceptions: Some promotional items may be excluded

title: Holiday Electronics Sale
description: During the holiday season (November 25 - December 31), all electronics receive a 20% discount with a maximum discount of $200 per item. This includes smartphones, laptops, tablets, and gaming accessories. Sale prices cannot be combined with other discounts.

title: International Shipping Restrictions
description: Certain products cannot be shipped internationally due to regulatory restrictions. This includes batteries, liquids, aerosols, and hazardous materials. Customers will see shipping restriction notices during checkout for affected items.
applies_to: Orders shipping outside the United States
exceptions: Some items may ship to Canada with restrictions

title: Price Match Guarantee
description: We match competitor prices for identical products from authorized retailers. The competing price must be verifiable and currently available. We'll match the price and give an additional 5% discount. Price matching is available for items under $500.
applies_to: Products under $500 with verified competitor pricing
exceptions: Marketplace sellers and auction sites excluded

title: Support Escalation Policy
description: Customer support tickets that remain unresolved for more than 24 hours are automatically escalated to a supervisor. Customers receive notification of escalation and expected resolution timeframes. Critical issues are escalated immediately.

title: Payment Method Acceptance
description: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and store gift cards. Buy Now, Pay Later options are available through Klarna and Afterpay for orders between $50-$1000.
exceptions: Some payment methods may not be available internationally

title: Product Warranty Coverage
description: All electronics come with manufacturer warranties ranging from 1-3 years depending on the product. We also offer extended warranty plans that can be purchased at checkout. Warranty claims are processed through our service center or authorized repair partners.
exceptions: Refurbished items may have limited warranty
